metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: o Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices.
o 1/4 cup vinegar  o 1/4 cup sugar  o 1/4 cup water  o 1 teaspoon salt  o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  •  Instructions:  o Shred cabbage and slice onion and apple.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices.  o Cover and cook until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.  o Add salt to taste and serve.    Albondigas  •  Ingredients:  o 1/2 pound ground beef  o 1/2 pound ground pork  o 1 small onion  o 2 cloves garlic  o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs  o 1 egg  o 1 teaspoon paprika  o 1 teaspoon salt  o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  o 1/4 cup olive oil  o 1 cup tomato sauce  •  Instructions:  o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten  egg, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl.  o Form mixture into meatballs.  o Heat olive oil in a pan and brown meatballs on all sides.  o Add tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.  o Serve warm.    Antipasto  •  Ingredients:  o Assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto)  o Cheeses (mozzarella, provolone)  o Olives  o Marinated vegetables (artichokes, peppers)  o Breadsticks  •  Instructions:  o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter.  o Serve with breadstick

o 1/4 cup vinegar  o 1/4 cup sugar  o 1/4 cup water  o 1 teaspoon salt  o 1/2 teaspoon pepper  •  Instructions:  o Shred cabbage and slice onion and apple.  o Sauté onion in a pot until softened.  o Add cabbage, apple, vinegar, sugar, water, salt, and pepper.  o Simmer for 45 minutes until cabbage is tender.  o Serve warm.    Saganaki  •  Ingredients:  o 1/2 pound kefalotyri cheese  o 1/4 cup flour  o 1/4 cup olive oil  o 1 lemon  •  Instructions:  o Cut cheese into slices.  o Dredge cheese in flour.  o Heat olive oil in a pan and fry cheese until golden on both sides.  o Squeeze lemon juice over the top and serve immediately.    Salade Niçoise  •  Ingredients:  o 4 tomatoes  o 1 cucumber  o 1 small red onion  o 1/4 cup olives  o 1/4 cup green beans  o 2 hard-boiled eggs  o 1 can tuna  o 1/4 cup olive oil  o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar  o 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard  o 1 teaspoon salt  •  Instructions:  o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.  o Blanch green beans until tender.
